text:
At the 2018 Billboard Music Awards on Sunday night (May 20), host Kelly Clarkson delivered an impressive genre-spanning medley of hits from the night’s nominees — from Maren Morris to Kendrick Lamar.

Related Here Are All the Winners From the 2018 Billboard Music Awards

And when Clarkson landed on Taylor Swift‘s “Look What You Made Me Do,” Swift, who had a front-row seat to the show, dramatically sang along before letting out a laugh.

Explore See latest videos, charts and news Kelly Clarkson Taylor Swift See latest videos, charts and news

Watch the brief clip below.
title: Taylor Swift Sings Along As Kelly Clarkson Performs ‘Look What You Made Me Do’ at the Billboard Music Awards

meta_data.description: At the 2018 Billboard Music Awards on Sunday night (May 20), host Kelly Clarkson delivered an impressive genre-spanning medley that included Taylor Swift's "Look What You Made Me Do."
